food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: I grow on trees.
I am curved, not straight.
I start with the letter 'B'.

food.question: I am round and red, and I can be sweet or sour. You can make juice with me. What am I?

hints.text: I grow on trees.
Snow White loved me (but be careful!).
You can make a pie out of me.

food.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: I grow underground.
Eating me is good for your eyes.
Bugs Bunny's favorite snack.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: I am a liquid.
I make your bones strong.
Often served cold.

food.question: I am a small, round, green vegetable. I grow in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: I am often served as a side dish.
I am a type of legume.
Some people don't like to eat me.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: I come in different shapes and sizes.
I am a staple food in many countries.
You can toast me.

food.question: I'm a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and sweet green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: I have small black seeds inside.
My skin is edible, but most people peel it.
I am a good source of Vitamin C.

food.question: I am made from potatoes, often fried, and salty. I am often eaten with ketchup. What am I?

hints.text: I am a popular side dish at fast food restaurants.
I am often served in a paper container.
People often add salt to me.

food.question: I am a grain that is often served in a bowl, I can be brown or white and many countries grow me. What am I?

hints.text: I'm a staple food for a large percentage of the world's population.
I am often served with vegetables or meat.
I grow in paddies.

food.question: I am a dish made with eggs, cheese, and other ingredients, cooked in a pan. You can eat me for breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: I can have vegetables, meat, or cheese inside.
I am cooked over heat.
I'm often served with toast.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I often build my home in your backyard. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and often work with others.
💪 I can carry things much heavier than myself.
🥪 I love crumbs of your sandwiches.

bug.question: I fly with colorful wings. I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I love to eat leaves when I'm young.
🏡 I sleep in a chrysalis.
🌸 I like to drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I hop and jump and make a chirping sound. I have long back legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live in grassy fields.
🦵 My legs help me jump very far.
🎶 I make music, especially in the summer.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. I am considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a small, round beetle.
🌱 Gardeners like me because I eat other bugs.
⚫ I have many dots.

bug.question: I fly and buzz, and make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I love flowers.
🐝 I live in a hive.
🍯 I make something sweet.

bug.question: I glow in the dark on summer nights. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I light up without batteries.
🌃 I'm most active after sunset.
🪲 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🕷️ I have eight legs, not six.
🪰 Flies get stuck in my trap.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise and look just like a leaf. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 My camouflage helps me hide from predators.
🌿 I eat plants.
🦗 I am related to grasshoppers.

bug.question: I pretend to be a twig to avoid being eaten. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am long and skinny.
🌳 I blend in with trees.
🐛 I am an insect.

bug.question: I am known for my beautiful wings that look like stained glass, and I live near water. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I start my life in water.
🌈 My wings shimmer in the sunlight.
👀 I have very large eyes.
